description:
Contents:
 - Summer Outfit: Sunny "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
 - Summer Kid: Sunny "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
 - Fashion-Statement Hat: Sunny "A flower hat accessory fashionably worn on the back. Colorful flowers added for cuteness."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it
name: Summer Outfit Set(Sunny)
